bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: The Charles E. Feinberg Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, 1839-1919
bibl.note: Transcribed from our own digital image of original manuscript.

hi.seg:
I'll I'd make the Songs of the Nation.—
let pass who makes
the Laws or lead to War who may.

l.seg: I'll make the Songs of The States,
I'd make the Songs of the Nation—who —whoever may
make the laws or lead to war
